apoli:category
Checks for the category of a biome.
Biome Condition Types operate on a Biome.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:category`
Checks for the category of a biome.
## Biome Condition Type
Biome Condition Types operate on a Biome.

[Biome Condition Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/biome_Condition_types/)

category.description: Which category the biome must be in order to succeed the check. See List of Biome Categories for possible values.
